00034 TOnlineFrame::TOnlineFrame(const TGWindow * p,std::string module_file_name):TGMainFrame(p, width,
00035                 height)
00036 {
00037 
00038         fCurrentDisplay = 8;
00039         run_nr = 0;
00040 
00041         // read macroses from the external file
00042         //const char *is_name = "/home/daq/DAQ/online-display/MODULES";
00043         const char *env_name = "DAQdir";
00044         std::string env_value = "";
00045         std::string is_name;
00046         if ( getenv(env_name) )
00047         {
00048                 if (module_file_name.empty() ) module_file_name="MODULES";
00049                 env_value = getenv(env_name);
00050                 is_name = env_value + "/online-display/"+module_file_name;
00051         }
00052         else
00053         {
00054                 std::cerr << "***ERROR! shell variable " << env_name << " is not set. The program will not be able to find display modules." << std::endl;      
00055         }
00056 
00057         //const char *is_name = "/home/daq/DAQ/online-display/MODULES";
00058         std::cout << "Reading modules from file [" << is_name << "]" << std::endl;
00059         ifstream *is = new ifstream( is_name.c_str() );
00060         char buf[1024];
00061         std::string args;
00062         while ( is->good() )
00063         {
00064                 *is >> std::ws;
00065                 is->getline(buf,1024);
00066                 if ( buf[0] == '#' ) continue;
00067                 if ( is->gcount() < 2 ) break;
00068                 std::istringstream iss (buf,std::istringstream::in);
00069                 screen_info info={"","","",false};
00070                 iss >> std::ws >> info.visibleName >> std::ws >> info.macroName>> std::ws >>args;
00071                 if (!args.empty()) {
00072                         info.macroArgs=args;
00073                         info.hasArgs =true;
00074                 }
00075                 screens.push_back(info);
00076                 std::cout << buf << std::endl;
00077                 args="";
00078         }
00079         delete is;
00080 
00081         // configure macro path
00082         std::string macro_path = gROOT->GetMacroPath();
00083         macro_path += std::string(":")+std::string(env_value)+std::string("/online-display/modules");
00084         gROOT->SetMacroPath( macro_path.c_str() );

00230 Bool_t TOnlineFrame::ProcessMessage(Long_t msg, Long_t param1,
00231                 Long_t param2)
00232 {
00233         Bool_t ret = false;
00234         char name[1024];
00235         char text[1024];
00236 
00237         switch (GET_MSG(msg)) 
00238         {
00239                 case kC_COMMAND:      
00240                         switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) 
00241                         {       
00242                                 case kCM_BUTTON:
00243                                         if (param1 >= SCREENS_BASE) 
00244                                         {
00245                                                 ULong_t ucolor_black;
00246                                                 gClient->GetColorByName("#000000",ucolor_black);
00247                                                 fButtons[screens[fCurrentDisplay].visibleName]->SetTextColor(ucolor_black);
00248                                                 fCurrentDisplay = param1 - SCREENS_BASE;
00249                                         }
00250                                         if ( param1 == B_UPDATE || param1 >= SCREENS_BASE )
00251                                         {
00252                                                 UpdateDisplay();
00253                                         }
00254                                         else if (param1 == B_PRINT) 
00255                                         {  
00256                                                 unsigned long int t = time(NULL);
00257                                                 sprintf(name,"%s_run_%06ld_%lu.pdf",screens[fCurrentDisplay].visibleName,run_nr,t);
00258                                                 fEmbeddedCanvas->GetCanvas()->Print(name);
00259                                                 sprintf(name,"%s_run_%06ld_%lu.png",screens[fCurrentDisplay].visibleName,run_nr,t);
00260                                                 fEmbeddedCanvas->GetCanvas()->Print(name);
00261                                                 sprintf(text,"Canvas printed to file [%s]",name);
00262                                                 print_msg(text);
00263                                         }
00264                                         else if ( param1 == B_CONNECT )
00265                                         {
00266                                                 if ( ConnectToServer() )
00267                                                 {
00268                                                         ConsiderAutoupdate( kTRUE );
00269                                                 }
00270                                         }
00271                                         else if ( param1 == B_FILE_OPEN )
00272                                         {
00273                                                 TGFileInfo fi;
00274                                                 const char *file_types[] = {"hist files", "h*.root",
00275                                                         0, 0};
00276                                                 fi.fFileTypes = file_types;
00277                                                 fi.fMultipleSelection = kFALSE;
00278                                                 fi.SetMultipleSelection( kFALSE );
00279                                                 //TGFileDialog *f = new TGFileDialog(gClient->GetRoot(),this,kFDOpen,&fi);
00280                                                 if ( fi.fFilename )
00281                                                 {
00282                                                         if ( OpenRootFile(fi.fFilename) )
00283                                                         {
00284                                                                 ConsiderAutoupdate( kTRUE );
00285                                                         }
00286                                                 }
00287                                         }
00288                                         ret = true;
00289                                         break;
00290                                 default:
00291                                         printf("Unknown command received\n");
00292                                         break;    
00293                         } // switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg))
00294                         break; // case kC_COMMAND
00295                 case kC_TEXTENTRY:
00296                         switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) 
00297                         {       
00298                                 case kTE_ENTER:
00299                                         if ( OpenRootFile( fFileName->GetText(), kFALSE ) )
00300                                         {
00301                                                 ConsiderAutoupdate( kTRUE );
00302                                         }
00303                                         break;    
00304                         }
00305                         break; // case kC_TEXTENTRY
00306         } // switch (GET_MSG(msg)) 
00307 
00308 
00309 
00310         return ret;
00311 }

00313 void TOnlineFrame::UpdateDisplay(){
00314         screen_info &current_display=screens[fCurrentDisplay];
00315         //runMacro(macro);
00316         if(fLoadedMacros.count(current_display.macroName) ==0) {
00317                 gROOT->LoadMacro(current_display.macroName.c_str());
00318                 cout<<"Loaded macro: "<<current_display.macroName<<endl;
00319                 fLoadedMacros.insert(current_display.macroName);
00320         }
00321         int last_slash=current_display.macroName.rfind("/")+1;
00322         std::string command=current_display.macroName.substr(last_slash);
00323         int extension_start=command.find(".");
00324         command=command.substr(0,extension_start);
00325         if(!current_display.hasArgs) command+="()";
00326         else command+=current_display.macroArgs;
00327         cout<<"Processing Line: "<<command<<endl;
00328         gROOT->ProcessLine(command.c_str());
00329 
00330         cout<< "about to set color"<<endl;
00331                 ULong_t ucolor_red;
00332                 gClient->GetColorByName("#FF0000",ucolor_red);
00333         fButtons[screens[fCurrentDisplay].visibleName]->SetTextColor(ucolor_red);
00334         gPad->Update();
00335 }

00343 
00344 void TOnlineFrame::ConsiderCycling()
00345 {
00346         if(fCycleDisplays->GetState() == kButtonDown) 
00347         {
00348                 fCurrentDisplay = (fCurrentDisplay+1) % screens.size();
00349                 const char *macro = screens[fCurrentDisplay].macroName.c_str();
00350                 runMacro(macro);
00351         }
00352 }
00353 
00360 void TOnlineFrame::ConsiderAutoupdate(const Bool_t force)
00361 {
00362         if (((fAutoUpdate->GetState() == kButtonDown) && fCycleDisplays->GetState()) != kButtonDown || force ) 
00363         {
00364                 const char *macro = screens[fCurrentDisplay].macroName.c_str();
00365                 runMacro(macro);
00366         }
00367 }

00391 const unsigned int TOnlineFrame::getAutoUpdateTime() const
00392 {  
00393         unsigned int t = atol(fAutoUpdateTime->GetText());
00394         if ( t < 1 ) t = 1;
00395         return t;
00396 }
00397 
00398 TSocket *TOnlineFrame::ConnectToServer()
00399 {
00400         TSocket *s = NULL;
00401         const char *hostname = getServerName();
00402         const unsigned int port_nr = getServerPort();
00403         char msg[1024];
00404 
00405         gROOT->DeleteAll();
00406         fEmbeddedCanvas->GetCanvas()->Clear();
00407         fEmbeddedCanvas->Clear();
00408 
00409         ULong_t ucolor_white;
00410         gClient->GetColorByName("#ffffff",ucolor_white);
00411 
00412 
00413         if ( (s = openSocket(hostname,port_nr)) == 0 )
00414         {
00415                 sprintf(msg,"Cannot connect to port %d on host [%s]",port_nr,hostname);
00416                 print_msg(msg);
00417                 print_msg("ERROR",2);
00418                 exit(1);
00419                 //fServerName->ChangeBackground(ucolor_white);      
00420         }
00421         else
00422         {
00423                 sprintf(msg,"Connected to remote server %s:%d",hostname,port_nr);
00424                 print_msg(msg);
00425                 sprintf(msg,"%s:%d",hostname,port_nr);
00426                 print_msg(msg,2);
00427                 //ConsiderAutoupdate( kTRUE );
00428                 ULong_t ucolor_green;
00429                 gClient->GetColorByName("#A0F5A0",ucolor_green);
00430                 fServerName->ChangeBackground(ucolor_green);
00431         }
00432         //fFileName->SetText("");
00433         fFileName->ChangeBackground(ucolor_white);
00434         fpSock = s;
00435         return s;
00436 }
00437 
00438 TFile *TOnlineFrame::OpenRootFile(const char *filename, const Bool_t update_filename)
00439 {
00440         TFile *f = NULL;
00441         char msg[1024];
00442 
00443         gROOT->DeleteAll();
00444         fEmbeddedCanvas->GetCanvas()->Clear();
00445         fEmbeddedCanvas->Clear();
00446 
00447         ULong_t ucolor_white;
00448         gClient->GetColorByName("#ffffff",ucolor_white);
00449 
00450 
00451         if ( (f = openRootFile(filename)) == 0 )
00452         {
00453                 sprintf(msg,"Cannot open ROOT file [%s]",filename);
00454                 print_msg(msg);
00455                 print_msg("ERROR",1);
00456                 print_msg("ERROR",2);
00457                 exit(1);
00458                 //fFileName->SetText("");
00459                 //fFileName->ChangeBackground(ucolor_white);
00460         }
00461         else
00462         {
00463                 sprintf(msg,"Connected to ROOT file %s",filename);
00464                 print_msg(msg);
00465                 print_msg(basename((char*)filename),1);
00466                 print_msg("File",2);
00467                 //fFileName->SetText(basename(filename));
00468                 //ConsiderAutoupdate( kTRUE );
00469                 ULong_t ucolor_green;
00470                 gClient->GetColorByName("#A0FfA0",ucolor_green);
00471                 fFileName->ChangeBackground(ucolor_green);
00472         }
00473 
00474         if ( update_filename )
00475                 fFileName->SetText(basename((char*)filename));
00476 
00477         fServerName->ChangeBackground(ucolor_white);
00478 
00479         return f;
00480 }

00482 
00483 void TOnlineFrame::runMacro(const char *macro)
00484 {
00485 
00486         char txt[1024];
00487 
00488         run_nr = get_run_number();
00489         sprintf(txt,"%ld",run_nr);
00490         print_msg(txt,1);
00491         sprintf(txt,"Executing  macro [%s]",macro);
00492         print_msg(txt);
00493 
00494         gROOT->DeleteAll();
00495         clear_recv_buffer();
00496         fEmbeddedCanvas->GetCanvas()->Clear();
00497         fEmbeddedCanvas->Clear();
00498         gROOT->cd();
00499         gROOT->Macro(macro);  
00500         // check status
00501         int status = get_status_code();
00502         if ( status != 0 )
00503         {
00504                 const char *msg = "";
00505                 switch ( status )
00506                 {
00507                         case RDISP_ERR_NO_CON:
00508                                 msg = "No connection to remote server";    
00509                                 break;
00510                         case RDISP_ERR_BAD_RESPONSE:
00511                                 msg = "Bad response from the server";
00512                                 break;
00513                         case RDISP_ERR_NO_RESPONSE:       
00514                                 msg = "No response from the server";
00515                                 break;
00516                         case RDISP_ERR_NO_SOURCE:
00517                                 msg = "No sources opened";
00518                                 break;
00519                         case RDISP_ERR_BROKEN_PIPE:
00520                                 msg = "Broken pipe";
00521                                 break;
00522                         case RDISP_ERR_NO_FILE:
00523                                 msg = "Cannot open ROOT file";
00524                                 break;
00525                         case RDISP_ERR_NO_FOLDER:
00526                                 msg = "Cannot load root folder from the ROOT file";
00527                                 break;
00528                         default:
00529                                 msg = "Unknown error";
00530                                 break;
00531                 }
00532                 print_msg( msg );
00533         }
00534 }
00535 
00536 void TOnlineFrame::print_msg(const char *msg, const Int_t partidx)
00537 {
00538         printf("%s\n",msg);
00539         fStatusBar->SetText(msg, partidx);
00540 }

00556 
00557 TH1* TOnlineFrame::GetHist(const char * histname)
00558 {
00559         if (!fpSock)
00560                 return NULL;
00561 
00562         char req[2048];
00563         sprintf(req, "GET %s", histname);
00564         TMessage *msg;
00565 
00566         fpSock->Send(req);
00567         fpSock->Recv(msg);
00568         TH1 *hist = (TH1*) msg->ReadObject(msg->GetClass());
00569         //hist->Print();
00570         //hist->Draw();
00571 
00572         delete msg;
00573         return hist;
00574 }
00575 
00576 std::vector<TString> TOnlineFrame::GetHistTitles()
00577 {
00578         std::vector<TString> v;
00579         if(!fpSock)
00580                 return v;
00581 
00582         fpSock->Send("LIST");
00583         TMessage *msg;
00584         fpSock->Recv(msg);
00585         TObjArray *objArray = (TObjArray *)msg->ReadObject(msg->GetClass());
00586         for (int i = 0; i < objArray->GetEntries(); ++i)
00587         {
00588                 TObjString *title = (TObjString *)objArray->At(i);
00589                 v.push_back((TString)title->GetString());
00590         }
00591         delete msg;
00592         return v;
00593 }
